title: Minister of Foreign Affairs holds working session with Croatian counterpart
text:
Minister of Foreign Affairs and National Community Abroad, Mr Ramtane Lamamra, held Saturday a working session with Croatiaâ€™s Minister of Foreign and European Affairs, Gordan Grlic Radman, who is on a two-day visit to Algeria.
The talks focused on ways and means for strengthening bilateral relations between the two countries in all fields, especially economic cooperation, as well as on regional and international issues of common interest.
Discussions between the two sides were broadened to delegations from both countries to discuss ways to tighten bilateral relations in all areas, and issues of common interest.
On this occasion, a memorandum of understanding of diplomatic collaboration was signed between the Institute of Diplomacy and International Relations (IDRI), of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and National Community abroad, and the Diplomatic Academy of Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Croatia.
A business forum scheduled on the sidelines of this visit will also focus on opportunities for the development of the economic and commercial partnership between Algeria and Croatia.
